attributes.title: PEDOFILE
attributes.review: I thought this app would be making fun of him, but it was far from it! I cant believe there’s people who still support this fascist, racist, homophobic, transphobic, xenophobic, pedofile! Donald J Trump is a disgusting human being and a disgrace to America.
